name: pulverization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the process of pressing or crushing something until it becomes powder or a soft mass: The grant would have been used for an environmental upgrade at a pulverization plant. Powdered confectioners’ sugar undergoes pulverization to achieve its powdered state
informal the act of defeating someone easily: The mission was an intervention, not a pulverization. Our players are still recovering from the pulverization we took last week. See
pulverize
